name: Once There Was, Once There Wasn't
name_original: Once There Was, Once There Wasn't
description:
Once There Was, Once There Wasn't

"Welcome to your story. I’m your host, the Witch. Who would you like to play as?"

 "Wait, what?"

"Don’t mind the King. He’s easily confused, poor soul. You can pick whichever path intrigues you."

"I’m lost."

"No, dear, you’re cursed. By me."

From the makers of Eldritch Detective: The Case of the Startled Salon, Zero Sum Game, and Le Cirque Des Souvenirs comes a new multimedia fanwork, Once There Was, Once There Wasn't. This year's project draws on folk and fairy tales from around the world to weave an emphatically queer tapestry of magic, mystery, and mayhem.

Play Time: 1-2 hours per storyline (5 storylines total)
Total Audio Time: 6 hours, 10 minutes
Number of puzzles: 10 + 1 sorting quiz
Warnings:
Questing Hero storyline: None
Youngest Daughter storyline: Misgendering & gendered language, fairy tale-typical violence
Enigma storyline: Mention of attempted assault
Heroic Maiden storyline: Attempted assault, implied drugging, horror themes, bullying, implied underage drinking
Witch storyline: None
